title: Monday Pt1: Brady Interest, Prediction Week, Dynamic New Duo, and Bills Hype,
itunes:title: Monday Pt1: Brady Interest, Prediction Week, Dynamic New Duo, and Bills Hype,
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Opening Day interest in Tom Brady. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty kick off 'Prediction Week' with their nominees for Rookie Offensive Player of the Year.  We look at new duos to be watching this season before looking at the Chargers-Raiders matchup.  Plus, with all the Super Bowl talk around the Bills...have they been over-hyped?  Stay tuned for Part Two!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
